name: Earth Hour
description:
Earth Hour is a global energy-saving activity proposed by WWF.  It advocates closing unessential power consumption products for one hour the last Saturday night every March to remind people to save energy, reduce emissions and protect the environment. This  game is named by this activity, telling players to protect our homeland in the form of turning off the switch.

It is a game playing on the PC to test the player’s reaction ability. 

It contains a map with 10 levels including a restaurant level, a school level, a factory level and so on. 

Players control the character by clicking the mouse.
